Text: Adobes reader works fine, but you will need to swipe in the direction opposite to reading. To avoid this, I recommend a reader with Right to Left reading option (e.g ezPDFpro). For the best reading experience with ezPDF, use 'image' option under zoom.

Acknowledgement: the images have been copied from Hamy Ghanem's popular android app. However I found the app difficult to use, and some features were disabled with updates. Hence I have produced this easy to use file , which works on any platform given a pdf reader. Enjoy!!!
Thanks. I know it's waaaaay off topic, but do you know where I could get a Spanish/English translation file (not requiring Internet access) for my Android? Thanks again.

@gallio; Thanks for the help, but I went to Android Marketplace and tried to download SpanishDict through Gmail, but it told me that there are no Android phones associated with my account. So now I either have to figure out how to associate it or get the app from some other source.  Thanks.
